amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of National Intelligence to report to Congress on the status of current efforts for continuous evaluation of security clearance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 10 printed in House Report 114-155 to require an ODNI report on continuous evaluation of security clearance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Farr.
